alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 2:18PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Logan and western Johnson Counties through 245 PM CST... At 218 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ratcliff, or near Paris, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Paris... Magazine... Subiaco... Hartman... Ratcliff... Hoyt... Woodland... Hinkle... Coal Hill... Caulksville... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Harmony... Roseville... Yale... Friley... Union City... Oark... Hunt... Wolf Pen Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
